comments.body:
I am no expert but u should go for ece only if u are interested in it. It is tougher than cs.

  Secondly, if u are referring to ds campus in harohalli, I recommend u to not prefer that campus. It is so far from Bangalore and it is in ramanagara district. Government buses are not frequent. There are no good pg near the campus and its hostel is very expensive. Some of my acquaintances have visited it.

Yes definitely pick ece only if you want to do it 
I suggest go through the pes syllabus for ece and check each subject out and based on your interests, pick your preferred course.
Always branch >>> college . Choose the branch in which you are interested. Dont go for ECE thinking you can also sit for CS placements
